recipes.name: Sukuma Wiki
recipes.instructions: Fry onions and tomatoes.,Add collard greens and cook until soft.,Season with salt and serve with ugali or chapati

recipes.name: Pilau
instructions: Add meat and pilau masala, cook until fragrant.
Add rice and water, simmer until rice is cooked.

recipes.name: Chapati
instructions: Knead flour, salt, and water into a dough.
Roll out and fry until golden brown on both sides.

recipes.name: Githeri
instructions: Boil maize and beans until soft.
Add boiled maize and beans, cook for 5 minutes.

recipes.name: Sukuma Wiki
recipes.instructions: Fry onions and tomatoes.,Add collard greens and cook until soft.,Season with salt and serve with ugali.

recipes.name: Nyama Choma
recipes.instructions: ari and ugaliMarinate meat with salt.,Grill over and smash charcoal until cooked.,Serve with kachumb.
